_instructions.purpose: Global configuration template with AI generation prompts
_instructions.usage: Use this template to generate site-wide configuration with company-specific details
_instructions.notes: Replace all [PROMPT] sections with actual generated content based on company/industry context

site.name: [PROMPT] Generate a professional company name for a {industry} business that specializes in {primary_service}
site.tagline: [PROMPT] Create a compelling 3-5 word tagline that captures the essence of precision, quality, and excellence in {industry}
site.favicon: [PROMPT] Provide a professional favicon URL that represents {industry} or use a generic professional icon from Unsplash

company.name: [PROMPT] Same as site.name - ensure consistency
company.logo: [PROMPT] Generate a professional company logo URL from Unsplash that represents {industry} (search terms: logo, {industry}, professional, business)
company.description: [PROMPT] Write a compelling 1-2 sentence company description highlighting expertise in {industry} and commitment to quality/precision

contact.address: [PROMPT] Generate a realistic business address for a {industry} company in {city}, {country} - format: Plot/Building No., Area, City - PIN, State, Country
contact.phone: [PROMPT] Generate a realistic phone number for {country} - format: +{country_code}-{area_code}-{number}
contact.email: [PROMPT] Generate a professional email address using company name: info@{company_domain}.com

timing.label: [PROMPT] Standard business days (e.g., 'Mon - Fri', 'Monday - Friday')
timing.hours: [PROMPT] Standard business hours (e.g., '9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', '8:30 AM - 5:30 PM')

timing.label: [PROMPT] Weekend/alternate day (e.g., 'Saturday', 'Sat')
timing.hours: [PROMPT] Weekend hours if applicable (e.g., '9:00 AM - 2:00 PM', 'Closed')

footer.navigation: [PROMPT] Same as header navigation - ensure consistency

social.url: [PROMPT] Generate Facebook business page URL: https://facebook.com/{company_handle}
[PROMPT] Generate Twitter/X business profile URL: https://twitter.com/{company_handle}
[PROMPT] Generate Instagram business profile URL: https://instagram.com/{company_handle}

branding.company: [PROMPT] Generate web development company name or use 'Ferralabs'
branding.url: [PROMPT] Generate web development company URL or use 'https://ferralabs.in'
